entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Murdochville

entry.title: Friday: Snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
